question: Cops Eye: New app to help police is launched for this Tamilnadu's City.
explanation: Madurai police have come up with a new app "Cops Eye." Based on face recognition feature, it would help them detect people with criminal backgrounds by clicking photographs. The data of 2,000 criminals has their names, photographs and details of criminal cases.Taking photograph of any person whose data is available with the centralised criminal analysing system will give all particulars.
